styledDialogAddClients.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to add clients to a purpose
styledDialogAddClients.title: Add clients

content.loadingMessage: Loading clients to associate to purpose

styledDialogAddSecurityOperator.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to add security operators to a client
styledDialogAddSecurityOperator.title: Add security operators

content.adminAlert: If you plan on uploading public keys for this client, add yourself as a member of this client, too

styledDialogAddSecurityOperatorKeys.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to add a public key to a client
styledDialogAddSecurityOperatorKeys.title: Upload new public key

nameField.label: Key name (required)
nameField.infoLabel: It will help you tell them apart

infoLabel.message: If you don't know how to create the keys? Follow the

styledDialogExistingAttribute.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to add an existing attribute or a group of attributes
styledDialogExistingAttribute.title: Add attribute or group

content.message: If you select more than one attribute at a time, it will be treated as a "group". The Subscriber will need to possess only one among the attributes in a group to allow for the validation to pass (e.g. be a "Municipality" or a "Region")

styledDialogExtension.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to send a request for an E-Service extension to its Provider
styledDialogExtension.title: Request extension

content.message: Fill in the form stating the reasons why you think your party is entitled to subscribe to this E-Service. Remember to add all legal basis and purposes. A notification will be sent to the E-Service Provider

styledDialogNewAttribute.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to create a new attribute
styledDialogNewAttribute.title: Create new attribute

codeField.label: Authoritative source id (required)
codeField.infoLabel: A kebab-case version of the name (e.g. "My Authoritative Source" becomes "my-authoritative-source")

styledDialogSetPurposeExpectedApprovalDa.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to set the estimated completion date to activate a Subscriber purpose
styledDialogSetPurposeExpectedApprovalDa.title: Set estimated completion date

content.message: You can update it at any moment. Any change will be notified to the Subscriber

styledDialogUpdatePurposeDailyCalls.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to update the number of API calls/day for a purpose
styledDialogUpdatePurposeDailyCalls.title: Update number of API calls/day

dailyCallsField.label: Number of API calls/day (required)
dailyCallsField.infoLabel: Your estimated number of API calls per day. This value will add up until it meets one of the thresholds set by the Provider. When it does, the Provider will have to manually approve any further purpose or change in API calls/day to guarantee the technical sustainability of the E-Service

styledDialogSessionExpired.ariaDescribedBy: Modal to go to login page since the current session has expired
styledDialogSessionExpired.title: Session expired

content.description: You are about to be redirected to the login page

error.message: Error: the operation could not be completed
